nodes.text: The Canto Bight Mounted Police, abbreviated as CBMP, were police officers of the Canto Bight Police Department that used Cantonica Zephyr GB-134 speeders. In 34 ABY, during a mission undertaken by Rose Tico, Finn and BB-8 of the Resistance, the CBMP chased them down as they rode a fathier. Eventually, Finn, Rose, and BB-8 were able to escape.
